keel.Algorithms.Fuzzy_Rule_Learning.Hybrid.PDFCS

Class PDFC

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.SVM.SMO.SMO
      • keel.Algorithms.Fuzzy_Rule_Learning.Hybrid.PDFCS.PDFC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TechnicalInformationHandler, WeightedInstancesHandler

    public class PDFC
extends SMO
    This class implements the Positive Definite Fuzzy Classifier from Chen and Wang's paper: Ref: Y. Chen, J.Z. Wang, Support Vector Learning for Fuzzy Rule-Based Classification Systems. IEEE Transactions on Fuzzy Systems 11(6) 716-728.
    Since:
    JDK 1.5
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Written by Julián Luengo Martín 10/12/2008

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class keel.Algorithms.SVM.SMO.SMO

        SMO.BinarySMO
